articles.title: What the Ivy League canceling its seasons means for college basketball, other sports - ESPN
articles.description: The Ivy League announced Thursday that it had canceled its winter sports, including basketball, for 2020-21. Here are the wider implications for college athletics.
articles.content: In an unfortunate echo of March, the Ivy League on Thursday became the first Division I league to cancel its men's and women's basketball seasons, announcing that it would not play any winter sports … [+22625 chars]
